body:
## Using Bzlmod

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_foreign_cc", version = "0.15.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_foreign_cc",
    sha256 = "92bf237df47776ef5127506234135a48de939b57553c253097b632726d881a7d",
    strip_prefix = "rules_foreign_cc-0.15.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/releases/download/0.15.0/rules_foreign_cc-0.15.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_foreign_cc//foreign_cc:repositories.bzl", "rules_foreign_cc_dependencies")

# This sets up some common toolchains for building targets. For more details, please see
# https://bazel-contrib.github.io/rules_foreign_cc/0.15.0/flatten.html#rules_foreign_cc_dependencies
rules_foreign_cc_dependencies()

# If you're not already using bazel_skylib, bazel_features or rules_python,
# you'll need to add these calls as well.

load("@bazel_skylib//:workspace.bzl", "bazel_skylib_workspace")

bazel_skylib_workspace()

load("@bazel_features//:deps.bzl", "bazel_features_deps")

bazel_features_deps()

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories")

py_repositories()

```


## What's Changed
* Improve flags handling for meson by @mering in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1303
* cmake: put CMAKE_SYSTEM_{NAME,PROCESSOR} into toolchain file by @novas0x2a in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1365
* win: fix proper EXT_BUILD_ROOT in PATH by @jsun-splunk in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1358
* fix sysroot for make and pkgconfig built tools by @jsun-splunk in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1356
* bzlmod: prevent extension from registering repos by @novas0x2a in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1374
* add xcompile support for ppc64le for autotools and cmake by @novas0x2a in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1373
* feat: support make vars in postfix_script by @jsun-splunk in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1375
* Allow cmake to use pkg-config for dependencies by @chouquette in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1370
* chore(ci): Add arm64 tests for root module by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1378
* add a static_suffix attr by @matt-sm in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1372
* chore(deps): Update libpng by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1377
* chore(deps): Update rules_python to 1.2.0 by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1380
* chore(deps): Update rules_perl by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1381
* use string.removesuffix by @matt-sm in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1382
* Add shellcheck tests for generated build scripts by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1390
* Absolutize paths beginning with `bazel-out/` by @allsey87 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1392
* Add support for Emscripten by @allsey87 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1383
* chore: update cmake versions by @novas0x2a in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1399
* feat: meson additional targets by @jjmaestro in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1385
* fix: allow rules to consume tools env data by @jsun-splunk in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1397
* fix: broken msvc builds by @jsun-splunk in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1400
* fix: Update apr / apr-util versions to fix CI by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1402
* chore: Bump min OS in CI as Ubuntu 20.04 is now EOL by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1408
* chore: Seperate platform specific shellcheck tests by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1409
* chore: Update openssl version to latest of the 1.1.1 series by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1410
* fix: full_label by @jjmaestro in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1404
* chore: Update default version of cmake to last of the 3.x series by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1411
* Release 0.15.0 by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1412

## New Contributors
* @mering made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1303
* @chouquette made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1370

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/compare/0.14.0...0.15.0

## What's Changed
* Pin Bazel version back to 7.4.1 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1350
* Added README describing toolchain patches by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1349
* fix: `pyc` files in Meson `mesonbuild` repo causing rebuilds by @jjmaestro in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1343
* Added formatting checks for C/C++ and python code by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1348
* fix: CMAKE_MODULE_LINKER_FLAGS_INIT breaks macos builds by @jsun-splunk in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1344
* Simplify docs by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1351
* Added rust example by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1354
* framework: avoid forced path suffixing by @novas0x2a in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1346
* Upgrade rules_python to version 1.1.0-rc0 by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1355
* Move protobuf to a dev dependency by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1363
* add cmake configuration attr by @matt-sm in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1339
* Release 0.14.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1364


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/compare/0.13.0...0.14.0

## What's Changed
* Remove dependencies on rules_cc by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1269
* Bump APR version to 1.7.5. Make CI/CD green again. by @dmitry-j-mikhin in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1273
* Fix for #1239 by @dmitry-j-mikhin in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1264
* runnable_binary: avoid using > on the output file by @novas0x2a in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1270
* Bazel CI config: explicitly enable workspace wherever Bzlmod is disabled by @Wyverald in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1276
* Support location expansion and make variable substitution in CMake cache entries by @allsey87 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1272
* Fix for #1271, set_file_prefix_map attribute by @aaron-michaux in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1288
* add foreign_cc deps to cmake prefix path by @matt-sm in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1311
* fix undefined variables in the wrap_outputs script by @novas0x2a in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1278
* Fix documentation link in README.md by @bradneuman in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1301
* fix: builds using preinstalled_make no longer break during pkgconfig by @voxeljorge in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1307
* correct overeager slash conversion on windows by @novas0x2a in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1285
* feat: force GH Linguist syntax highlight by @jjmaestro in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1312
* Remove deprecated use of incompatible_use_toolchain_transition by @EdSchouten in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1314
* fix: move all bazelbuild links to bazel-contrib by @jjmaestro in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1315
* fix: move more bazelbuild links to bazel-contrib by @jjmaestro in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1317
* fix: docs pages by @jjmaestro in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1316
* fix: let 'toolchain' attr be selectable by @jsun-splunk in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1321
* feat: configurable ldflags by @jsun-splunk in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1226
* msvc: fix make var for windows deps by @jsun-splunk in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1324
* fix: doc pages (take 2!) by @jjmaestro in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1327
* fix(cmake): make sure link flags are propagated to module library builds by @jungleraptor in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1308
* chore: more precommit hooks by @jjmaestro in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1325
* chore: Update cmake versions by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1331
* Add dependency on rules_shell by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1337

## What's Changed
* Re-export runfiles env vars so that dependencies can use them by @mishazharov in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1235
* Apply expand_locations_and_make_variables to cache_entries by @froody in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1240
* Revert "Apply expand_locations_and_make_variables to cache_entries" by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1250
* Fix macOS CI by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1251
* Upgrade default ninja version to 1.12.1 by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1248
* Add setup_args and run `meson setup` explictly by @allsey87 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1223
* Portable copy_dir_contents_to_dir by @lamcw in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1246
* Do not clobber user environment variables in Meson script by @allsey87 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1255
* runnable_binary: use package_relative_label by @lamcw in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1253
* configure_make: support autotools cross-compilation by @novas0x2a in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1247
* cmake: handle builds that use static toolchain libs by @novas0x2a in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1256
* Fix `_get_make_variables` ignoring user environment variables by @allsey87 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1230
* add support for cc_shared_library deps by @matt-sm in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1243
* autotools: return darwin as os instead of cmake in xcompile by @novas0x2a in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1258
* Update BCR presubmit by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1259
* fix meson tests for macOS CI by @jsun-splunk in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1260
* Merge user provided CPPFLAGS with build system CPPFLAGS by @allsey87 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1261

## What's Changed
* Add missing sha256 for meson_src 1.1.1 by @lalten in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1111

* set CC and CXX and their flags in meson by @xytan0056 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1098
* Turn off bzlmod in CI for now by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1142
* Fix `//openssl/...` by calling `openssl_setup()` by @bcsgh in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1137
* Sort tests under examples/third_party and add zlib to the list. by @bcsgh in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1136
* Use gazelle to generate bzl_library targets by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1127
* Use platform specific configs in bazelrc to reduce scope of settings by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1144
* Update to ubuntu 20.04 on RBE by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1145
* Remove explicit mention of bazel 4.x support by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1146
* Add mirrors to external repositories by @mishazharov in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1153
* Build msvc cmake with prebuilt cmake by @matt-sm in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1148
* Simplify the toolchain registration for bzlmod by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1105
* Update CMake versions by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1159
* Fix tool path for nmake by @jsun-splunk in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1165
* chore(deps): Bump rules_apple. Fixes #1156 by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1166
* Add make 4.4.1 by @novas0x2a in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1167

* Add aarch64 to prebuild library constraints for macos by @dmeijboom in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1176

* Fix - Copy Dir ignores hidden files on macOS by @LaurenceTews in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1188

* Exclude filenames with spaces from cmake toolchains by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1199
* fix: change cygpath to mixed mode by @jsun-splunk in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/pull/1204

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_foreign_cc",
    sha256 = "476303bd0f1b04cc311fc258f1708a5f6ef82d3091e53fd1977fa20383425a6a",
    strip_prefix = "rules_foreign_cc-0.10.1",

rules_foreign_cc_dependencies()
```

## Migration Instructions
- The `configure_make` attributes `autoconf_env_vars`, `autogen_env_vars`, `autoreconf_env_vars`, and `configure_env_vars` have been removed. Use `env` instead.
- The `cmake` attribute `env_vars` has been removed, use `env` instead.
- The common attribute `make_commands` has been removed. Instead, use `targets` and `args` which are available on each platform. With the addition of `tool_prefix` and existence of `postfix_script` we're able to cover all known use cases.

## Release Notes

- Provide `out_data_dirs` attribute (#419) (#622)
- Updated macos install behavior to be more consistent with other platforms (#687)
- Removed legacy `*env_vars` attributes from `cmake` and `configure_make` rule (#675)
- Removed make_commands attribute and fixed configure_make (#671)
- update cmake to 3.20.4 (#680)
- Added support for replacing sandbox paths in build artifacts (#650)
- Added tool_prefix attribute (#676)

## Migration Instructions
The migration instructions are the same as those of 0.2.0 except for this release they are mandatory as the deprecated functions have been removed:

- Update load paths containing `tools/build_defs` to `foreign_cc`
- Update load paths `for_workspace` to `foreign_cc`
- Update loads of `workspace_definitions.bzl` to `foreign_cc:repositories.bzl`
- Migrate use of `keep_going` in `make` targets to explicitly pass `-k` or patch the Makefile so that it doesn't require the keep going behaviour.

## Release Notes

- Added CMake versions 3.20.2, 3.20.1, 3.20.0 & 3.19.7 (#636) (#605) (#587)
- Various fixes to permissions / copying logic to ensure that input files aren't modified, allowing use of `--spawn_strategy=standalone` (#603) (#646) (#656) (#583)
- Set MAKE env var for the "make" binary used in `configure_make` and `make` rules (#638)
- Features `layering_check`, `module_maps`, and `thin_lto` are disabled from being passed to the external build system (#631)
- Add `--action_env` support to MacOS and unify environment variables across platforms (except Windows). (#647)
- Built Make toolchains can now be used in RBE (#548)

## Known Issues

- Building CMake from sources requires a host installed version of make.

# 0.2.0

https://bazelbuild.github.io/rules_foreign_cc/0.2.0/

## Usage

Add the following to your `WORKSPACE` file:
```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_foreign_cc",
    sha256 = "d54742ffbdc6924f222d2179f0e10e911c5c659c4ae74158e9fe827aad862ac6",
    strip_prefix = "rules_foreign_cc-0.2.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/archive/0.2.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_foreign_cc//foreign_cc:repositories.bzl", "rules_foreign_cc_dependencies")

# This sets up some common toolchains for building targets. For more details, please see
# https://bazelbuild.github.io/rules_foreign_cc/0.2.0/#rules_foreign_cc_dependencies
rules_foreign_cc_dependencies()
```

## Migration Instructions
Existing code should continue to work but the following migrations should be made to ensure future compatibility with these rules:

- Update load paths containing `tools/build_defs` to `foreign_cc`
- Update load paths `for_workspace` to `foreign_cc`
- Update loads of `workspace_definitions.bzl` to `foreign_cc:repositories.bzl`
- Migrate use of `keep_going` in `make` targets to explicitly pass `-k` or patch the Makefile so that it doesn't require the keep going behaviour.

## Release Notes

- `@rules_foreign_cc//foreign_cc:defs.bzl` was introduced and contains all common build rules. #555
- Symbols in `tools/build_defs` and `for_workspace` and  have been moved into `foreign_cc`. Users should update their load statements to use the new paths. #555 #557
- Toolchain definitions are now located in `toolchains`. #541
- The `cmake_external` rule has been renamed to `cmake`. #539
- A new `targets` attribute was added to the `cmake`, `configure_make`, and `make` rules. This should be used over `make_commands` for building targets. #556
- The `make` rule no longer passes the `PREFIX` argument as part of the default build command. #556
- The `keep_going` attribute (previously defaulted to `True`) is deprecated, users can maintain this behavior by passing `-k` themselves. #556
- Logs from built tools are now written to a file and only printed to the terminal when the target fails to build. #559
- Output attributes on common rules have been renamed from `*_libraries` to `out_*_libs`. #538 
- Downloaded CMake tools should now work on docker-sandbox / RBE #545 
- The min supported version is raised from `3.4.0` to `3.7.0`. #561

## Known Issues

- The built make tool doesn't work on RBE.

# 0.1.0

https://bazelbuild.github.io/rules_foreign_cc/0.1.0/

Note this will be the last release to be tested on Bazel **3.4.0**. All releases going forward will be tested on **4.0.0**.

## Usage

Add the following to your `WORKSPACE` file:
```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_foreign_cc",
    sha256 = "c2cdcf55ffaf49366725639e45dedd449b8c3fe22b54e31625eb80ce3a240f1e",
    strip_prefix = "rules_foreign_cc-0.1.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc/archive/0.1.0.zip",
)

load("@rules_foreign_cc//:workspace_definitions.bzl", "rules_foreign_cc_dependencies")

# This sets up some common toolchains for building targets. For more details, please see
# https://bazelbuild.github.io/rules_foreign_cc/0.1.0/#rules_foreign_cc_dependencies
rules_foreign_cc_dependencies()
```

Note that this release will default to using a downloaded version of cmake and ninja. If you want to revert to the previous behaviour of using the host installed version call use `rules_foreign_cc_dependencies(register_default_tools = False)` in your `WORKSPACE` file. The use of the host installed tools can be disabled using the `register_preinstalled_tools` argument.

## Release Notes
- Added repository rules for downloading prebuilt versions of cmake and ninja rather than relying on system installed tools.

- Added native ninja build rule

- Now builds under the bazel sandbox rather than in /tmp

- Tidied up the structure of the examples directory

- Deprecated the old rules install_ws_dependency and cc_configure_make

- Autogenerated documentation was added
